TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeTable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The attribute table is a read-only collection of metadata attributes that are associated with specific types, members, and dependencies.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此表是使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> 创建的，并且它由 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore> 使用。
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> 是使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> 创建的，并且它由 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore> 使用。

member this.AttributedTypes : seq<Type>

Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all types that have attribute overrides, on a property, member, or the type itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定在将此特性表添加到元数据存储区中时将刷新哪些类型。

Docs.param: The type to check for metadata.
Docs.summary: Determines whether this table contains metadata for the given type.
Docs.returns: if the table contains metadata for the type at the class level or metadata associated with a or ; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the given arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从不返回 null 枚举。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes (Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ GetCustomAttributes(Type ^ type);
member this.GetCustomAttributes : Type -> System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.param: The type to get class-level attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all class-level attributes provided for the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.
